description: In the final championship bout of our Summer Smackdown Tournament we present a live tag team match featuring Doug "The Destroyer" Acre and Jesse "Cutthroat" Colter vs. last year's champion, Leo "The Force" Forte and Billy "The Bodyslam" Santoro. These Kombatants have fought with all their might to advance to the final round and with the horny crowd cheering them on they fight even harder. The winner will go down in history as the Summer Smackdown Champion but the losers will face their wrath with public humiliation to boot.
title: Summer Smackdown Live Finale
